markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Defensive Instincts](/Feats.aspx?ID=2813) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goloma" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=381" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 117 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Requirements**
you are adjacent to at least two enemies

</column>

---

Your body tenses up when surrounded, putting you on edge just enough to anticipate an attack. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn and Step.
name: Defensive Instincts
requirement: you are adjacent to at least two enemies
requirement_markdown: you are adjacent to at least two enemies
